meanings.definition: Connected or operated through a network.
meanings.sent1: The networked computers allowed for easy sharing of information.
meanings.sent2: The office had a networked printer that everyone could use.
meanings.sent3: The networked devices formed a digital community of sorts.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like a networked web, interconnecting seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The networked system was as intricate as a spider's web.

meanings.sent1: The networked devices communicated effortlessly with each other.
meanings.sent2: The networked sensors provided real-time data to the control center.
meanings.sent3: The networked gadgets formed a technological clique.
meanings.sent4: Their relationship was like a networked chain, unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The networked nodes created a web of connectivity.

meanings.definition: To connect or operate through a network.
meanings.sent1: She networked her devices to streamline her workflow.
meanings.sent2: The company networked all its branches for better communication.
meanings.sent3: He networked his way into various social circles effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: The plants networked their roots underground to share nutrients.
meanings.sent5: The students networked their laptops to collaborate on the project.
